resources.string: Instructions are written in masculine form but address all genders
Draw a clock with all numbers showing the time %1$s
You have completed the first stage, now we will move to the next stage
You have a one-minute clock task ahead, please follow the instructions on the next page to start the test, press the continue button
Now, you see a clock showing 12:00, you need to move the hands forward by 40 minutes, then press the continue button
Now, move the clock hands forward by 1 hour and 25 minutes, then press the continue button
The task has been completed, thank you for your cooperation
